specificArticles.textContent: Our village is surrounded by mountains, lakes, heritage buildings, ancient roman galleries and mining industry. So, if you come to Ro»ôia Montana, don't visit just the museum and the local store, because the area has much more to offer. Check the trails below and find the ones you like, based on the touristic attractions you would like to see. The maps of the trails are made with google maps, so you can zoom in, see them in satellite mode or access them from any device. For each trail you'll find indications estimated by us and the ones within the map are provided by google. For most of the trails we added also links from where you can download de GPS data.
